Text:
I've started the download more than one month ago; have had some AMAZIIIIIIIIIIIING speeds (8, 9, even 12 KB/ sec).
Since July the 3rd (!!!) I'm stuck at 99,2% (54 MB left), the speed is 3 KB/s, but NOTHING HAPPENS!!!
Can anybody FUCKING SEED?? (pardon my French)
But, more important: where's THE 2ND DVD?
